title: Disconnected in Loading and Unable to Relog
body: I was in the loading screen for my ranked game where I was disconnected and unable to reconnect, I attempted to relaunch my game when it kept saying my username / password was wrong, another restart later it said my client was restored to a older version and would update but never did, so am I really gonna lose LP because of this new client, really rito?

replies.body: After pulling up your account, it looks like there might have been someone trying to log into your account at the same time you were in that ranked match, which caused you to be disconnected. I'd strongly suggest you hit up our account team in our [**account recovery form**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new?ticket_form_id=72416) to make sure you're account is still secure!

well I think I know who was trying for mine if you guys want to investigate it. Barcode killer on my block list. I kept telling him in all chat I knew he was ddos because he commented interesting after I had showed my team my ping. He continued and eventually said ty for what I said about what he was doing. then adds me (thought it was the rager from my team) I immediately blocked but had issues reclogging :(

ive been having problems like this as well. Just had one where I had around 400 something ping during load, and kept crapping out in game. Wouldn't let me exit in game, nor close it out of game. Restarting client eventually, and I get the invalid password crap. If a patch wasn't recently updated id blame it on a hacker. considering I  couldn't do shit all game got flamed n reported for it. of course a loss as well.
